trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem?displayProperty=fullName> event enables you to customize the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem?displayProperty=fullName>evento consente di personalizzare l'aspetto di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controllo mediante il disegno personalizzato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem?displayProperty=fullName>evento viene generato da un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controllare quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName>è impostata su `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawItem?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The DrawListViewItemEventArgs passed to the event handler contains information about the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> to draw and also provides methods to help you draw the item.
trans-unit.target: Il DrawListViewItemEventArgs passato al gestore dell'evento contiene informazioni sul <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>per disegnare e fornisce inoltre metodi che consentono di disegnare l'elemento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A> properties to retrieve information about the item to draw.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A>per recuperare informazioni relative all'elemento da disegnare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.ItemIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to retrieve the index of the item.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.ItemIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà per recuperare l'indice dell'elemento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.ItemIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property to do the actual drawing within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A>proprietà per eseguire il disegno effettivo all'interno dell'area specificata mediante il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A>

trans-unit.source: To draw standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> elements that do not need customization, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Per disegnare standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>gli elementi che non richiedono la personalizzazione, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawFocusRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To avoid issues with graphics flickering when owner drawing, override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Per evitare problemi di sfarfallio delle immagini durante il disegno personalizzato, eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controllo e impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A>proprietà `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DoubleBuffered%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: This feature is available only on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family when your application calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Questa funzionalità è disponibile solo in Windows XP e in Windows Server 2003 quando l'applicazione chiama il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> surface on which to draw.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> area su cui disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> within which to draw.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> all'interno del quale disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: L'indice del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> all'interno di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> insieme.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"></xref> values indicating the current state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Combinazione bit per bit di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"> </xref> valori che indicano lo stato corrente del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene le dimensioni e posizione di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: The location specified by this property is relative to the upper left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso specificato da questa proprietà è relativo angolo superiore sinistro di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the bounds for specific portions of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.GetBounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Per recuperare i limiti delle parti specifiche di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.GetBounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.GetBounds%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> che rappresenta i limiti del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: Draws the background of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> using its current background color.
trans-unit.target: Disegna lo sfondo del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> utilizzandone il colore di sfondo corrente.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw a standard background that uses the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per creare uno sfondo standard che utilizza il valore corrente del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.BackColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The background is drawn to fill the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Lo sfondo viene disegnato per riempire l'area specificata dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a property indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control will use the default drawing for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta una proprietà che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controllo utilizzerà il valore predefinito per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Set this property to `true` when the item does not require custom drawing.
trans-unit.target: Impostare questa proprietà su `true` quando l'elemento non richiede il disegno personalizzato.

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you need to customize only certain items within the control, such as selected items.
trans-unit.target: Ciò è utile quando è necessario personalizzare solo determinati elementi all'interno del controllo, ad esempio gli elementi selezionati.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the system draws the item; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the event handler draws the item.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il sistema viene creato l'elemento. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se l'elemento viene creato il gestore dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Draws a focus rectangle for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> if it has focus.
trans-unit.target: Disegna un rettangolo di attivazione per il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> se ha lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw a standard focus rectangle around the item.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per disegnare un rettangolo di attivazione standard intorno all'elemento.

trans-unit.source: The focus rectangle is normally drawn within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il rettangolo di attivazione normalmente viene creato all'interno dell'area specificata mediante il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the control is in the details view and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value is `false`, however, the focus rectangle is drawn around the default text area for the first column of the item.
trans-unit.target: Se il controllo è nella visualizzazione dettagli e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valore della proprietà è `false`, tuttavia, il rettangolo di attivazione viene disegnato intorno all'area di testo predefinito per la prima colonna dell'elemento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FullRowSelect%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The focus rectangle is drawn only when the item has focus, so you do not need to check the focus state of the item before you call this method.
trans-unit.target: Il rettangolo di attivazione viene creato solo quando l'elemento ha lo stato attivo, pertanto non è necessario controllare lo stato attivo dell'elemento prima di chiamare questo metodo.

trans-unit.source: Draws the text of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> using its current foreground color.
trans-unit.target: Disegna il testo del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> utilizzandone il colore di primo piano corrente.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw the item text using the current values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per disegnare il testo dell'elemento utilizzando i valori correnti del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The text is drawn within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il testo viene disegnato all'interno dell'area specificata mediante il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also draw the text manually using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile disegnare il testo manualmente tramite il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>recuperati tramite il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> method is most useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>metodo è particolarmente utile quando la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà è impostata su un valore diverso da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the details view, this method draws the text for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>, but does not draw the text for subitems.
trans-unit.target: Nella visualizzazione dei dettagli, questo metodo disegna il testo per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>, ma non consente di disegnare il testo per gli elementi secondari.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, in the details view, it is generally more convenient to draw all of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> text in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, nella visualizzazione dei dettagli, è in genere più utile disegnare tutti il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>testo in un gestore per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Draws the text of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> using its current foreground color and formatting it with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Disegna il testo del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> utilizzando il colore di primo piano corrente e di formattazione con la proprietà specificata <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to draw the item text using the current values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per disegnare il testo dell'elemento utilizzando i valori correnti del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Font%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ForeColor%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags> values specified in the `flags` parameter let you provide formatting properties for the node label, such as text alignment.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>valori specificati nel `flags` parametro consentono di fornire proprietà di formattazione per l'etichetta del nodo, ad esempio l'allineamento del testo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags>

trans-unit.source: The text is drawn within the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il testo viene disegnato all'interno dell'area specificata mediante il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Bounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also draw the text manually using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile disegnare il testo manualmente tramite il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>recuperati tramite il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Graphics%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> method is most useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>metodo è particolarmente utile quando la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà è impostata su un valore diverso da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the details view, this method draws the text for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>, but does not draw the text for subitems.
trans-unit.target: Nella visualizzazione dei dettagli, questo metodo disegna il testo per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>, ma non consente di disegnare il testo per gli elementi secondari.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, in the details view, it is generally more convenient to draw all of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> text in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto, nella visualizzazione dei dettagli, è in genere più utile disegnare tutti il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>testo in un gestore per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.DrawSubItem?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Combinazione bit per bit di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> utilizzato per disegnare il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class provides properties and methods useful for drawing on the display device.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>classe fornisce proprietà e metodi utili per il disegno sul dispositivo di visualizzazione.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa proprietà per accedere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>da disegnare.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A> property does not provide adequate information to meet your needs.
trans-unit.target: Questo è utile quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A>proprietà non fornisce le informazioni appropriate per soddisfare le esigenze.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A> property provides only basic state information that you can use, for example, to determine whether an item is selected, checked, or focused.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A>proprietà fornisce solo informazioni di stato di base che è possibile utilizzare, ad esempio, per determinare se un elemento è selezionato, selezionato o con stato attivo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.State%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Item property, on the other hand, allows you to access all members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà dell'elemento, d'altra parte, consente di accedere a tutti i membri di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: You must access the item directly, for example, to draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value yourself rather than using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: È necessario accedere l'elemento direttamente, ad esempio, per disegnare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>valore manualmente piuttosto che utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.DrawText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items*> collection of the containing <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'indice del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> all'interno di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items*>raccolta dell'oggetto contenitore <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items*>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: L'indice del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> all'interno di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> insieme.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo stato corrente del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref> da disegnare.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to check whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem> to draw is in a particular state.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa proprietà per controllare se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>da creare è in un determinato stato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem>

trans-unit.source: This property provides only basic state information about the item.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà fornisce solo informazioni di base sullo stato dell'elemento.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property, for example, to determine whether an item is selected, checked, or focused.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questa proprietà, ad esempio, per determinare se un elemento è selezionato, selezionato o con stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: If you need to know more, retrieve the item through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A> property and check its properties directly.
trans-unit.target: Se si desiderano maggiori informazioni, recuperare l'elemento tramite il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A>proprietà e archivia le relative proprietà direttamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawListViewItemEventArgs.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"></xref> values indicating the current state of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Una combinazione bit per bit di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStates"> </xref> che indica lo stato corrente di valori di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"> </xref>.
